channel.title: [525][Request] Fishing
channel.description:
I'm trying to reformat a fishing base to my 525 from a 508, I've fixed around 10 errors, but I still have 24 to go. Someone please tell me how to fix them: [code]Compiling net/com/Roflpvp/*.java .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:35: error: cannot find symbo l if (Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 303, 1) == true) { ^ symbol: method HasItemAmount(Player,int,int) location: variable playerItems of type PlayerItems .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:41: error: cannot find symbo l p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ symbol: variable Misc location: class NPCOption1 .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:44: error: method message in class Player cannot be applied to given types; p.message(p, "You need a small fishing net to fi sh Shrimp."); ^ required: String found: Player,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:47: error: method message in class Player cannot be applied to given types; p.message(p, "You need level 1 fishing to fish Shrimp.") ; ^ required: String found: Player,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:53: error: cannot find symbo l if (Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 305, 1) == true) { ^ symbol: method HasItemAmount(Player,int,int) location: variable playerItems of type PlayerItems .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:59: error: cannot find symbo l p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ symbol: variable Misc location: class NPCOption1 .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:62: error: method message in class Player cannot be applied to given types; p.message(p, "You need a big fishing net to fish Bass."); ^ required: String found: Player,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:65: error: method message in class Player cannot be applied to given types; p.message(p, "You need level 30 fishing to fish Bass.");
^ required: String found: Player,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:72: error: cannot find symbo l if (Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 301, 1) == true) { ^ symbol: method HasItemAmount(Player,int,int) location: variable playerItems of type PlayerItems .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:78: error: cannot find symbo l p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ symbol: variable Misc location: class NPCOption1 .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:81: error: method message in class Player cannot be applied to given types; p.message(p, "You need a lobster pot to fish Lob sters."); ^ required: String found: Player,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption1.java:84: error: method message in class Player cannot be applied to given types; p.message(p, "You need level 40 fishing to fish Lobsters ."); ^ required: String found: Player,String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:44: error: cannot find symbo l if (Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 307, 1) == true) { ^ symbol: method HasItemAmount(Player,int,int) location: variable playerItems of type PlayerItems .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:49: error: cannot find symbo l p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ symbol: variable k location: class NPCOption2 .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:52: error: cannot find symbo l p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need a fishing rod to fish Trout."); ^ symbol: variable frames location: variable p of type Player .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:55: error: cannot find symbo l p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 15 fishing to fi sh Trout."); ^ symbol: variable frames location: variable p of type Player .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:61: error: cannot find symbo l if (Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 311, 1) == true) { ^ symbol: method HasItemAmount(Player,int,int) location: variable playerItems of type PlayerItems .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:66: error: cannot find symbo l p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ symbol: variable k location: class NPCOption2 .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:69: error: cannot find symbo l p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need a harpoon to f ish here."); ^ symbol: variable frames location: variable p of type Player .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:72: error: cannot find symbo l p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 75 fishing to fi sh Sharks."); ^ symbol: variable frames location: variable p of type Player .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:78: error: cannot find symbo l if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 311, 1) == true) { ^ symbol: method HasItemAmount(Player,int,int) location: variable playerItems of type PlayerItems .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:84: error: cannot find symbo l p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ symbol: variable k location: class NPCOption2 .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:87: error: cannot find symbo l p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need a harpoon to f ish Manta rays."); ^ symbol: variable frames location: variable p of type Player .
et\com\RoflPvp
et\packethandler\NPCOption2.java:90: error: cannot find symbo l p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 90 fishing to fi sh Manta rays."); ^ symbol: variable frames location: variable p of type Player 24 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Ask me if you need me to post my npcoption1 class, my npcoption2 class, or my player methods/variables/etc. for fishing.

item.title: [525][Request] Fishing
item.dc:creator: @ownerz12 ownerz12
item.description:
